title: Panda Bear Shares New Song “Ends Meet”: Listen
description: The latest single from Sinister Grift features Noah Lennox’s Animal Collective bandmates Avey Tare and Geologist
author: Walden Green
excerpt: The latest single from Sinister Grift features Noah Lennox’s Animal Collective bandmates Avey Tare and Geologist
text: The latest single from Sinister Grift features Noah Lennox’s Animal Collective bandmates Avey Tare and GeologistPanda Bear has shared a new song. “Ends Meet” is the third single from Noah Lennox’s forthcoming album Sinister Grift, following “Ferry Lady” and the Cindy Lee collaboration “Defense.” It features instrumental contributions from Lennox’s Animal Collective bandmates Geologist and Avey Tare, alongside vocals by Maria Reis and Spirit of the Beehive’s Rivka Ravede. Listen to “Ends Meet” below.Sinister Grift is out February 28 on Domino. Lennox’s tour behind the album kicks off tonight in Minneapolis, MN. His last solo album as Panda Bear, Buoys, came out in 2019. Since then, he’s shared three versions of Reset, his collaborative album with Sonic Boom: Reset, Reset in Dub, and the Reset Mariachi EP.Read our track review of “Defense.”
html:
The latest single from Sinister Grift features Noah Lennox’s Animal Collective bandmates Avey Tare and Geologist

Panda Bear has shared a new song. “Ends Meet” is the third single from Noah Lennox’s forthcoming album Sinister Grift, following “Ferry Lady” and the Cindy Lee collaboration “Defense.” It features instrumental contributions from Lennox’s Animal Collective bandmates Geologist and Avey Tare, alongside vocals by Maria Reis and Spirit of the Beehive’s Rivka Ravede. Listen to “Ends Meet” below.

Sinister Grift is out February 28 on Domino. Lennox’s tour behind the album kicks off tonight in Minneapolis, MN. His last solo album as Panda Bear, Buoys, came out in 2019. Since then, he’s shared three versions of Reset, his collaborative album with Sonic Boom: Reset, Reset in Dub, and the Reset Mariachi EP.

Read our track review of “Defense.”
